EntityUIDisplayParams.displayDescription:
Item Type: Light Armor
Damage Reduction: 20%
Temp. Rating: -32 / 62 °C
Radiation Protection: 26000 REM
Radiation Scrub Rate: 145.8 REM/s
Carrying Capacity: 2.5 µSCU

Be the first on the scene with the Chiron armor. Designed to provide the essential protection that combat medics need, the armor features ultra-lightweight panelling to keep the wearer quick on their feet without compromising on safety. Crucial, high-impact sections have been reinforced with raised carbon plating on top of a highly durable polyfiber for maximum flexibility.

The Heartthrob edition is a dreamy, shimmering violet adorned with bright digital hearts; perfect for making friends and foes weak in the knees.

Localization.Name: Virgil
Localization.Description:
High-end Commercial and Personal armor manufacturer. Aside from combat uses, they build systems for heavy commercial and mining applications.

Models: Achilles PDS (Heavy Combat Armor)

Zeus System (Titan Armor)

English.Name: Virgil
English.Description:
High-end Commercial and Personal armor manufacturer. Aside from combat uses, they build systems for heavy commercial and mining applications.

Models: Achilles PDS (Heavy Combat Armor)
